      # File railties/lib/rails/rack/logger.rb, line 20
20:       def before_dispatch(env)
21:         request = ActionDispatch::Request.new(env)
22:         path = request.fullpath
23: 
24:         info "\n\nStarted #{env["REQUEST_METHOD"]} \"#{path}\" "               "for #{request.ip} at #{Time.now.to_default_s}"
